name: Puente de la Costa Sur
description: Accepts donations of clothing, housewares, furniture, and building materials; serves South Coast San Mateo County communities; pickup available
fullDescription: Puente de la Costa Sur accepts donations of household items and building materials to support their programs serving rural South Coast San Mateo County communities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept housewares and furniture
- Accept building materials
- Pickup available for large items
- Serves South Coast communities
- Support rural families in need
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Puente de la Costa Sur
2. Check accepted items list
3. Bring donations to location
4. Schedule pickup for large items
5. Support South Coast families
6. Get donation receipt
